Leandro's comments: We included I00 to I99 (i.e., the whole CVD category). B33.2: Viral carditis. G45: Transient cerebral ischaemic attacks ("mini-stroke"). G46: Additional coding after underlying cause is classified as I60-I69. K75.1: Phlebitis of portal vein.
Marko's comments: B33.2 is not included alone in GBD, It's part of "Myocarditis" cause group together with some I codes. G45 and G46 are similarly part of the "Ischemic stroke" couse group. K75.1 is part of the "Other cardiovascular and circulatory diseases" cause group. Thus, these can not be separated from GBD 2017 data without further information
This should be only "Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease" for air pollution. I changed this one.

Leandro's comments: ICD-10 codes used by Andrea not reported
Marko's comments: Someone need to chek this at some moment.

Leandro's comments: I60 to I66.9 only (including all sub-types). G45: Transient cerebral ischaemic attacks ("mini-stroke"). G46: Additional coding after underlying cause is classified as I60-I69. I67: Other cerebrovascular diseases. I68: Cerebrovascular disorders in diseases classified elsewhere. I69: Sequelae of cerebrovascular disease.
Marko's comments: G45 and G46 are part of the "Ischemic stroke" couse group.  I68.1-I68.2 are part of the "Intracerebral hemorrhage" cause group. I69.0-I69.3 codes are divided among all the different sub-categories of stroke. Thus, also these ones can not be separated from the data without additional data.
Marko's comment on air pollution: For AP defined as "cerebrovascular disease", so should beok.

Leandro's comments: We included C00 to D49 (i.e., the whole neoplasms category). Kxx.x: Polyps. N60: Benign mammary dysplasia. N84: Polyps. N87: Dysplasia of cervix uteri.
Marko's comments: K62.0-K62.1, K63.5 form own "Benign and in situ intestinal neoplasms" cause group that could be removed from rest of the Neoplasms. N60-N60.9 from own "Other benign and in situ neoplasms" cause group, that could be removed from rest of the Neoplasms. N84.0-N84.1, N87-N87.9 from own "Benign and in situ cervical and uterine neoplasms" cause group, that could be removed from rest of the Neoplasms.
